briefTitle: VisR for Noninvasively Interrogating Stromal Collagen Organization as a Breast Cancer Biomarker: Evaluation of Compression in Control Subjects
officialTitle: VisR Ultrasound for Noninvasively Interrogating Stromal Collagen Organization in Women as a Breast Cancer Biomarker: Evaluation of Surface Compression in Control Subjects
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients are 30-90 years of age
* Patients have received a negative result from mammogram screening in past year
* Patients have no history of breast disease
* Informed consent obtained and signed

Exclusion Criteria:

* Inability to provide informed consent
* Inability to communicate in English
* Inability to remain motionless for 15 minutes
* Any pathologies of the breast or history of breast disease
* Patients who are pregnant
* Patients who are lactating
* Patients with breast implants
* Patients with implanted cardioverters or pacemakers
